propertyMap.cardSubtitle: Vectorization of information related to areas.

registrarDetails.cardSubtitle: Fill in the information of the person responsible for doing the register (landholder, technical assistant, government officer, others).
registrarDetails.representativeDataSubtitle: Representative: In the Rural Environmental Registry (RER), the representative is an individual authorized by the property owner or landholder to act on their behalf at all stages of the registration process.

options.one: I do not have a representative
options.two: I have a representative and he/she is the registrar
options.three: I have a representative and he/she is not the registrar

registrarDetails.registrarMustBeDifferentFromRepresentati: Registrar must be different from Representative

landholdersInformation.cardSubtitle: Fill in the information about the landholder or land owner. This person is legally responsible for the land being registered.

chooseLandholderInfoMethod.label: Choose a way to add landholder's information
chooseLandholderInfoMethod.tooltip: Select how you want to provide the landholder's details: manually entering the data or importing from a file.

table.emptyData: There is no data to show.

landholdersInformation.warningModal: Please add at least one landholder.
landholdersInformation.warningModalRequired: All fields must be filled in before saving.
landholdersInformation.warningModalDelete: Are you sure you want to delete the Owner/Holder?

ruralProperty.cardSubtitle: Fill in the information of the rural property.

form.descriptionOfPropertyAcessTooltip: Provide details about how the property can be accessed, such as roads, landmarks, or specific directions. This field is optional.

formMailingAddress.addressStreetTooltip: Enter the official address or street name where the property is located.

propertyRights.cardSubtitle: Provide information of the property or landholding documentation.

form.propertyCertificationTooltip: Certification that verifies the legal status and compliance of the property according to national regulations.
form.nationalRuralPropertyRegistrationNumberT: Official registration number of the rural property, used for legal and administrative purposes.

legalReserve.label: Does it have a registered Legal Reserve and/or an approved but not registered Legal Reserve?

form.legalReserve2: Does not have a registered Legal Reserve and/or an approved but not registered Legal Reserve.
